roleset.name: be dramatically larger than

example.name: passivized
example.text: Courtaulds ' restructuring is among the largest thus far in Britain , though it-1 is dwarfed *trace*-1 by B.A.T Industries PLC 's plans to spin off roughly # 4 billion in assets to help fend off a takeover bid from Anglo - French financier Sir James Goldsmith .
example.arg: by B.A.T Industries PLC 's plans to spin off roughly # 4 billion in assets to help fend off a takeover bid from Anglo-French financier Sir James Goldsmith

roleset.note: DWARF-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dwarf' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. No comparison. (from dwarf.01-v predicate notes)
